name: Mogubai Kurdikar
description: '''Mogubai Kurdikar''' (15 July 1904 â€“ 10 February 2001) was an [[Hindustani classical music|Indian classical]] vocalist of the [[Jaipur-Atrauli Gharana]]. She was known for being a leading student of [[Alladiya Khan]] and the [[guru]] and mother of [[Kishori Amonkar]], a popular Hindustani classical female vocalist from the 20th century.
